title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.32 - Withholding of purse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.32 - Withholding of purse

State Regulations
A licensed harness race track shall be warranted in
withholding the premium or purse of any horse, if information establishes that
the declaration of any horse was fraudulent or that the horse was ineligible. Such premium shall be withheld by the licensed harness race track pending
decision of the commission concerning such fraud or
ineligibility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4111.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
